amendatorysection.chaptername: CITIES AND VILLAGES; LAWS APPLICABLE TO MORE THAN ONE AND LESS THAN ALL CLASSES
amendatorysection.catchline: Hearing to create a business improvement district; call by petition.
amendatorysection.para: In the event that the city council has not acted to call a hearing to create a business improvement district as provided in section 19-4029, it shall do so when presented with a petition signed by the record owners of thirty percent of the assessable front footage in a business area or by the users of thirty percent of space in a business area.
